body:
### Welcome to my legacy code pages.
Over the past few years, I've written a lot of code for a lot of different research projects.  Keeping track of all this code was a nightmare, and I'm sure I've lost quite a lot of it already. 

I've decided to put everything I still have hanging around in this git repository, where at least it will be accessible, and might even be useful at some point.

This (of course) is just a proto-webpage.  As more code gets added, it will be updated (yeah, seriously)...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Legacy-code
tagline: Bits and pieces of legacy code that are lying around on my system and that it would be a pity to loose
